title: AbodeStory Launches Innovative Property Management Site
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 12:08 PM Companies mentioned in this article: AbodeStory Inc. 
SAN MATEO, Calif., Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- AbodeStory ( www.abodestory.com ) today announced the launch of a unique home and property management platform for homeowners and landlords. AbodeStory facilitates seamless collaboration between all property stakeholders - including property owners, landlords and their tenants, agents, contractors and other home service providers - all in one place. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150908/264364LOGO 
Whether it's a single family home, income properties in multiple countries, or an apartment building in another state, property ownership and management is complex and time consuming. With AbodeStory, anyone can efficiently manage all home and property-related tasks, communications, and documents digitally, across time zones, from anywhere in the world. 
The intuitive platform allows users to create to-do lists, assign tasks and due-dates, communicate one-on-one or in groups, and send and receive files instantly. Users can securely store and organize important documents related to a property - including home maintenance records, insurance policies, rental agreements and payments, utility bills, contracts, and receipts - making them quick and easy to locate. The site automatically generates an historical timeline, which lets users efficiently track past and current projects, communications and transactions. 
In addition, AbodeStory users can access information from local contractors and other home service providers, including a description of services, reviews and ratings, photos and a contact link. Users can choose to work with their own service providers through the site or contact providers who've already created a listing on the site. 
"AbodeStory has streamlined interactions with my tenants, contractors and other service people, making property ownership less time consuming and stressful. AbodeStory has transformed the way I manage my properties," said Teresa Hill, a California resident who owns eight properties in multiple states and countries. 
About AbodeStory AbodeStory empowers homeowners and landlords to manage their property on a simple, easy-to-use platform, across time zones, from anywhere in the world. Originally created with international, multiple property owners in mind, AbodeStory simplifies communication, project management, and record-keeping for anyone who owns, manages, lives in, or works on one or more properties. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/abodestory-launches-innovative-property-management-site-300139236.html
